title: Daily Routine 1
sentences: jeden Morgen um sechs Uhr auf.
I wake up every morning at six o'clock.
When do you normally get up?
First I go into the bathroom.
I prefer to shower in the morning rather than in the evening.
Putzt du dir vor dem Frühstück die
Do you brush your teeth before breakfast?
I wash my face with cold water.
After the shower, I dry myself off.
I comb my hair in front of the mirror.
What are you wearing to work today?
I usually only have cereal for breakfast.
Do you drink coffee or tea in the morning?
I prepare my lunch for work.
At eight o'clock I leave the house.
Fährst du mit dem Bus oder mit dem
Do you go by bus or by car?
I am waiting at the stop for the subway.
The trip to work takes twenty minutes.
I arrive at the office on time.
First I turn on my computer.
Do you read your emails first?
I am replying to important messages.
Wir haben um zehn Uhr eine
We have a meeting at ten o'clock.
I talk on the phone a lot with clients.
Do you take a break at noon?
I eat my bread at the desk.
After the break, I continue working.
Ich brauche am Nachmittag noch einen
I need another coffee in the afternoon.
How is your day going so far?
Ich freue mich schon auf den
I am already looking forward to the end of the workday.
dictionary:
aufwachen - to wake up
aufstehen - to get up
das Badezimmer - bathroom
duschen - to shower
Zähne putzen - to brush teeth
das Gesicht - face
sich abtrocknen - to dry oneself off
die Haare kämmen - to comb one's hair
sich rasieren - to shave
sich anziehen - to get dressed
die Arbeit - work
frühstücken - to have breakfast
der Tee - tea
das Mittagessen - lunch
das Haus verlassen - to leave the house
das Auto - car
die Haltestelle - stop / station
dauern - to last / take (time)
pünktlich - punctual / on time
der Computer - computer
lesen - to read
antworten - to answer / reply
die Besprechung - meeting
der Kunde (Pl. Kunden) - client / customer
die Pause - break
das Brot - bread
weiterarbeiten - to continue working
der Kaffee - coffee
der Feierabend - end of the working day
